questions.question: Which would be the best topic sentence for this set of sentences?

choices.answer: My sister is so annoying.
She is always taking my stuff.
She pulls my hair
She sings too loud all the time.

questions.question: Alanna is afraid of spiders. She screams when she sees one. If she  sees one, she runs away.

choices.answer: Spiders have 8 legs.
Alanna is afraid of spiders.
If she sees one, she runs away.
If she sees one, she runs away.

questions.question: Topic sentences can sometimes appear at the end of a paragraph.

choices.answer: True
False

questions.question: I hate doing laundry. It takes too long. I hate          folding clothes. Wrinkles bother me.

choices.answer: It takes a long time to do.
I never can get the wrinkles out.
I hate doing laundry.
I do not like folding the clothes.

questions.question: Which would be the best topic sentence for this set of sentences?

choices.answer: Blowing a bubble is easy to do.
Now blow a bubble.
Put a piece of gum in your mouth.
Form the gum around the tongue.

questions.question: Mason loves soccer. He plays on 3 teams. He's played since 3 years old. He likes scoring goals.

choices.answer: He likes scoring goals.
He has played since he was three.
Mason really enjoys playing soccer.

questions.question: Which would be the best topic sentence for this set of sentences?

choices.answer: The malls are crowded in December.
Everyone is doing their holiday shopping.
The lines are way too long.
There are no parking spaces.

questions.question: Which would be the best topic sentence for this set of sentences?

choices.answer: I fell in front of the whole class.
My dog ate my homework.
I forgot my lunch.
What a horrible day I had!

questions.question: Which would be the best topic sentence for this   set of sentences?

choices.answer: I even got a strike!
I never knew bowling could be so much fun.
You get to talk to each other between turns.

questions.question: Which would be the best topic sentence for this  set of sentences?

choices.answer: Its surface temperature is 191-C.
It has 11 moons.
It has a large ring.

questions.question: Which would be the best topic sentence for this  set of sentences?

choices.answer: Fast food can be bad for your health.
Cheeseburgers have over 300 calories.
Fast food is often made with grease.
Most fast food has too much fat or sugar.

questions.question: Giving is better than receiving. Getting presents is best. I saw how giving makes others feel.

choices.answer: I thought getting presents was the best.
I liked all my gifts.
Then I saw how giving presents makes others feel.
Giving is better than receiving.
